DOC.brief_title: Assisting Children With Prenatal Alcohol Exposure Developing Peer Friendships
DOC.detailed_description: Targeted Area Intervention : Social skill development best friend relationship . The specific intervention twelve small group session ( 90 minute ) 6-week period . Child session consist 4 component : 1 ) child report homework assignment ; 2 ) didactic presentation , behavioral rehearsal , coaching , 3 ) coach play , 4 ) new homework activity assign parent . Topics address across session include : reduction maladaptive behavior , information exchange technique , place time make friend , group acceptance , praise child , negotiation , play date , deal teasing , winner/loser skill . At start intervention , parent child work staff develop list social skill , behavior , goal would like targeted child . Parent component : Kathleen Mitchell ( NOFAS ) investigator provide parent input study . Parent-only session instruct key feature teach child . Concurrent parent session include : 1 ) education FAS/ARND , 2 ) parent present specific issue child , 3 ) review current child session objective technique , 4 ) new homework activity develop , 5 ) parent child together review homework . Evaluation Plan : Treatment control ( WL ) group compare use pre- post-tests measure . Post-tests conclusion intervention 4-month follow-up . Baseline parent measure include Social Skills Rating Scale , FAS Behavior Scale , Test Advocacy Knowledge . Baseline child measure include knowledge social skill . Process ( e.g. , homework completion , attendance , etc ) outcome ( e.g. , social skill rating , progress towards individual goal ) measure evaluate .
